alert.note: Alert for Adams; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 10:56PM CDT until September 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union County in south central Iowa... Eastern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Northwestern Ringgold County in south central Iowa... Northeastern Taylor County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1056 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prescott, or 7 miles east of Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lenox and Cromwell around 1105 PM CDT. Kent around 1110 PM CDT. Creston Municipal Airport around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Diagonal, Arispe and Shannon City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
